name: 智代子
text:
……むにゃ……えへへ、みんな応援ありがと～……
私、アイドル頑張るからね～……ぐぅ……
trans: ...Srnnk... Ehehe, I wanna thank everyone who supported me～... I'll make sure to keep working hard as an idol～... Hnnn...

name: 果穂
text: すぅ……すぅ……
trans: Zzzzzz...

name: 樹里
text:
お疲れーっす
……ってなんだ、寝てんのか
trans:
What's up
...Wait, what the? Are you two sleeping?

name: 智代子
text: ……チョコのお城で……チョコパーティーを……むにゃ……
trans: ...We're gonna have our very own chocolate party... at my very own chocolate castle... Nnn...

name: 樹里
text:
……ブレねぇなこいつも……     
おい、チョコ。よだれ垂れてんぞ。おいって、起きろ
trans: ...Well aren't you sleeping well. Come on Choco, you're drooling. Get up already.

name: 智代子
text:
……よだれ……？
……ふあっ、樹里ちゃん！？　た、垂れてないよ！
trans:
...Drooling...? Bwah! Juri-chan!?
I-I wasn't drooling!

name: 智代子
text: っ！
trans: Slurp!

name: 樹里
text: いいからティッシュ使え。ほら……
trans: Come on, just use a tissue please! Here...

name: 智代子
text: ん、んむ、ありがとう……
trans: Y-Yeah, thanks...

name: 樹里
text:
ずいぶん気持ちよさそうだったじゃねーか
夢の中でもチョコまみれだったのかよ？
trans: You really were sleeping like a baby. You were dreaming of being surrounded by chocolate or something?

name: 智代子
text:
え！？　待って待って、私何か言ってた！？
全然覚えてない！
trans: Huh!? Wait just a second! What did I say while I was asleep!? I don't remember saying anything!

name: 樹里
text: 結構大掛かりな計画立ててたぜ
trans: I can already see someone plotting out their master plan.

name: 智代子
text: 何それっ、どういうこと！？
trans: What do you mean by that!?

name: 樹里
text:
あったけーからって気緩みすぎってこと
そのうち、チョコアイドル爆睡中って誰かに投稿されんぞ
trans: Just imagining a post of you sleeping a caption like "chocolate idol sleeps like a brick and drools everywhere," all over their social media.

name: 智代子
text:
そっ、それは困る、イメージが……！
私、寝る子属性とかついてないのに……！
trans: Th-that would definitely be pretty bad! If that happens, they might start calling me the "Sleeping Idol" instead of the "Chocolate Idol!"

name: 智代子
text: ……あぁ……でも、せっかく気持ちよく寝てたのになぁ……
trans: Man... And I was really enjoying that nap just now too...

name: 樹里
text: そのまま放っといてほしかったか？
trans: Do you really want me to forget it that badly?

name: 智代子
text:
そういうことでもないけど！
で、でも、果穂は起こしてないし！
trans: No, it's not that! L-Like what about Kaho? Kaho was sleeping just as deeply as I was!

name: 果穂
text: んん……すぅ……すぅ……
trans: Nnn... Zzzzzz...

name: 樹里
text: そりゃあ果穂はだらしなくねーしな
trans: Well that's because Kaho doesn't sleep like an absolute slob.

name: 智代子
text:
！？　わ、私だってだらしなくないよ！
樹里ちゃんひどい！　差別だー！
trans: Huh!? I-I don't sleep like a slob! Juri-chan's a bully! She's only picking on me!

name: 果穂
text: ……ふわぁ～……んー、あれ……？
trans: ...Hwahhh... Hm? Huh?

name: 智代子
text:
あっ、果穂！　おはよう
ごめんね、起こしちゃった？
trans: Oh Kaho! Good morning! Sorry, did we wake you up?

name: 樹里
text: ワリー、うるさかったな
trans: My bad. We were being really loud just now.

name: 果穂
text:
ちょこ先輩、樹里ちゃん……おはようございます……
すみません……寝ちゃってました……
trans: Choco-senpai, Juri-chan... Good morning... Sorry... I accidentally fell asleep here...

name: 果穂
text: ちょこ先輩の隣、あったかくて……えへへ
trans: It was so warm sleeping next to you Choco-senpai... Ehehe.

name: 智代子
text: いいんだよ全然！　よく眠れた？
trans: No worries! Did you sleep well?

name: 果穂
text: はいっ、気持ちよかったですっ
trans: Yeah, I feel great now.

name: 智代子
text: そっかそっか、良かった～
trans: I see, that's good to hear～

name: 樹里
text:
果穂はかわいい顔で寝てたもんな
よだれ垂らしてた誰かさんと違って
trans: Kaho is so cute when she sleeps. Unlike a certain drooling slob that we know.

name: 智代子
text: あーもうっ！　樹里ちゃんってば！
trans: Oh come on! Stop that, Juri-chan!

name: 果穂
text:
えへへっ、ちょこ先輩も気持ちよさそうでしたよね！
今日はお日さまもポカポカで、お昼寝びよりですしっ
trans: Ehehe, you're looking good right now too, Choco-senpai! It was so nice and warm today, that it was perfect for a nap.

name: 樹里
text: まぁ、春らしい天気だよな
trans: That's spring for you.

name: 果穂
text:
はいっ
外の桜も、この前まできれいに咲いてましたし！
trans: Yeah. And the sakura blossoms are really beautiful right now!

name: 果穂
text: 満開は過ぎちゃってますけど……
trans: Though they're already finished blooming...

name: 樹里
text: お花見とかできたら良かったよなぁ
trans: It would have been nice if we were able to go flower viewing together.

name: 果穂
text:
お花見っ……！？　樹里ちゃんっ、それスッゴくいいですっ
あたし大賛成ですっ！
trans: Flower viewing!? Juri-chan, that's a great idea! A really, really am completely with you there!

name: 樹里
text:
うお！？　いや、今からだとちょっとな
見ごろは過ぎちまってるし……
trans: Woah!? Well I mean, I dunno if we can now. After all, the time for flower viewing ended a while back...

name: 果穂
text: あ……やっぱり、そうですよね……
trans: Ah... Oh yeah, I guess you're right...

name: 樹里
text:
来年とか、またチャンスはあるしよ、そん時行こうぜ！
なっ？
trans: We'll get another chance to go next year! Let's all go together then! How about it?

name: 果穂
text: はい……
trans: Okay...

name: 智代子
text: ……待ってふたりとも！　私いいこと思いついた
trans: ...Wait a minute you two! I just thought of an idea!

name: 智代子
text:
お花見はできなくても、代わりにお菓子なら用意できるよ！
だからさ──
trans: Since we aren't able to go flower viewing, how about we make some sweets together instead!? And then, we──

name: 果穂
text: おやつ、食べるんですか？
trans: And then we can eat them?

name: 智代子
text: 違っ……うとも言いきれないけど……
trans: No... She didn't let me finish...

name: 樹里
text: 飲み物、用意するか？
trans: Do you have any drinks prepared?

name: 智代子
text:
いやいやっ、今じゃなくて！
今度、お菓子を作って食べようって話だよ！
trans: No, no! I'm not talking about right now! I'm saying the next time we meet up, we can make some sweets that we can eat afterwards!

name: 智代子
text:
桜のお菓子を持ってって、みんなで外でパーティーするの！
お花見の代わりにさ！　……どうかな？
trans: We can make the some sakura-themed snacks and have our own sort of flower viewing party! How about that?

name: 樹里
text: チョコ……
trans: Choco...

name: 果穂
text:
わあぁ……！　スッゴく楽しそうですっ
えっとえっと、お菓子は何を作るんですか？
trans: Wow! That sounds super duper fun! Umm, umm, what sweets are we going to make?

name: 智代子
text:
桜といえば桜餅でしょ！
ほらっ、ピンクでかわいいしねっ
trans: When you're talking about sakura, you have to go with sakura mochi! They are both pink after all.

name: 果穂
text: ちょこ先輩、作れるんですか！？
trans: You know how to make them, Choco-senpai!?

name: 智代子
text: うん、うちでは毎年作ってるからね～
trans: Yeah, I make them every year, you know～

name: 果穂
text:
わーっ、スゴいです！　あたしにも教えてくださいっ！
おいしい桜餅、作ってみたいです！
trans: Wow, you're so cool Choco-senpai! Can you teach me how to make them too!? I also wanna try making some tasty sakura mochi!

name: 智代子
text: もちろん！　一緒にいっぱい作っちゃおう！
trans: Of course! We can make lots together!

name: 智代子
text: ね、樹里ちゃん！
trans: Right, Juri-chan!?

name: 樹里
text:
えっ、アタシもか……？！
いやでも和菓子って、アレコレ面倒なんじゃ……
trans: Huh, you're including me too?! I mean, I'd probably just get in the way...

name: 智代子
text:
手順がわかっちゃえば大丈夫だよー
ほら、樹里ちゃんテキパキしてるしさ！
trans: If you follow the recipe well, it'll be fine. Come on Juri-chan, I know yours will turn out perfectly!

name: 果穂
text:
あたし、みんなで一緒に桜餅が作りたいです！
樹里ちゃんとも一緒がいいですっ
trans: I really, really want to make sakura mochi with everyone else! You're making some with us, right Juri-chan?

name: 果穂
text: ……だめですか……？
trans: ...You're not...?

name: 樹里
text:
う……
わ、わかったよ……そこまで言うなら……
trans: Uhh... S-Sure, I'll come along... If you're going to say it like that...

name: 智代子
text: 樹里ちゃんやっさしーい
trans: Awww, you're so kind Juri-chan!

name: 樹里
text: おいっ
trans: Hey.

name: 智代子
text:
えへへ、とにかく決まりだね！
凛世ちゃんと夏葉ちゃんにも後で言わなくちゃ！
trans: Ehehe, then it's decided! I'll make sure to tell Rinze-chan and Natsuha-chan about our plans later!

name: 智代子
text:
桜餅パーティーに向けて、
みんなでお菓子作り、頑張ろう！
trans: Everyone, let's make the best sakura mochi ever for our party!

name: 果穂
text: おーっ！
trans: Yeahhh!

name: 樹里
text: お、おー……
trans: Y-Yeah...
